meanings.definition: The dimensions, proportions, amount, or extent of something.
meanings.sent1: The sizes of the boxes varied greatly.
meanings.sent2: She carefully measured the sizes of the furniture before buying.
meanings.sent3: The clown tried to fit into the tiny car, but his large shoes kept him from adjusting to the sizes inside.
meanings.sent4: In the vast universe, the sizes of stars can be mind-boggling.
meanings.sent5: The sizes of the waves crashing against the shore were mesmerizing.

meanings.definition: To make or adjust the dimensions, proportions, amount, or extent of something.
meanings.sent1: He sizes the wood to fit the frame perfectly.
meanings.sent2: They sized the dress to make it smaller for her.
meanings.sent3: The chef sized the portions of the meal to ensure everyone had enough to eat.
meanings.sent4: She sized her response to match the intensity of the situation.
meanings.sent5: The tailor sized the suit to make it look custom-made.

meanings.definition: A range of dimensions or proportions.
meanings.sent1: The store offers a wide range of sizes for all body types.
meanings.sent2: The sizes available for the shoes were limited.
meanings.sent3: The sizes of ice cream flavors at the shop were surprisingly diverse.
meanings.sent4: The sizes of emotions he experienced that day were extreme.
meanings.sent5: The sizes of options in the menu made it hard to choose.
